title: Drawing, "Sketchbook Page: Iris Temple, Bologna. Verso: Anatomical Study", 1811–14
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
markings: Watermark: lily in double oval over letters AFC
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Interior of church of tomb, Santo Sefano, Bologna. Verso: two anatomical sketches of male body, legs inscribed 5 and 7.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketchbook Page: Iris Temple, Bologna. Verso: Anatomical Study", 1811–14.
1811–14. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2436.
